title: Ep. 580 - The Power of Melanin
description:
A major liberal writer resigns in disgust from the New York Times, a black celebrity calls white people animals, and the federal government starts killing criminals again.

Ben's new book "How to Destroy America in Three Easy Steps" is coming out July 21st. Get your signed copy here => https://utm.io/uGvC
